description.lang: The GoControl GD00Z-7 is the next iteration of the best selling line of Z-Wave controlled remote garage door status indicator and activator.Adding S2 security and OTA capability, the GD00Z-7 continues to Norteks leadership positing in the IOT market. Open or close a sectional garage door remotely through a Z-Wave certified Gateway or Security Panel. Compatible with virtually any garage door opener connected to a sectional garage door. Audible and visual warnings prior to remotely-activated door movement, meeting UL 325 safety requirements. Included tilt sensor reports door "open" or "close" information.
